sqlMap.select: select profil_total_id, profil_param_id, total, min, acquis_$$f, ordre_col, longueur, ordre_lg from profil_totaux where etu_id = #etu_id:NUMERIC# and diplome_$$c = #diplome:VARCHAR# and prd_debut = #prd_debut:VARCHAR# order by ordre_lg,ordre_col

select $etu_id$ as etu_id, '$diplome$' as diplome, '$specialite$' as spec, '$prd_debut$' as prd_debut, profil_total_id as id, lib_abr as libelle, ordre from ref_profil_total where diplome_$$c = #diplome:VARCHAR# and nvl(dipl_spec_$$c,'*')=nvl(#specialite:VARCHAR#,'*') and niv_entree=#niveau_entree:VARCHAR# and #prd_debut:VARCHAR# between prd_debut and prd_fin order by ordre
select profil_abr, profil_lib, legende, profil_ordre from ref_profil where diplome_$$c=#diplome:VARCHAR# and legende is not null order by profil_ordre

select etu_id, (select an_univ||prd_univ from uv_ouv uo,uv_ouvertes uos where uos.uv_ouv_id = uo.uv_ouv_id and uos.nle_uv_ouverte_id = eiu.nle_uv_ouverte_id) as periode,
(select diplome_$$c from uv_ouvertes where nle_uv_ouverte_id = eiu.nle_uv_ouverte_id) as diplome_$$c, (select uv_$$c from uv_ouv uo,uv_ouvertes uos where uos.uv_ouv_id = uo.uv_ouv_id and uos.nle_uv_ouverte_id = eiu.nle_uv_ouverte_id) as uv_$$c, (select categ_abr from ref_categorie where categ_id = eiu.categ_id_insuv) as categ_abr, resuv_$$c, nb_credits_ects_insuv, (select profil_abr from ref_profil where profil_id = eiu.profil_id and diplome_$$c=#diplome:VARCHAR#) as profil_abr, profil_$$f from etu_inscr_uv eiu where etu_id= #etu_id:NUMERIC# and trim(substr(eiu.inscr_adm_id,7,5)) = #diplome:VARCHAR#

select etu_id, (select an_univ||prd_univ from uv_ouv uo,uv_ouvertes uos where uos.uv_ouv_id = uo.uv_ouv_id and uos.nle_uv_ouverte_id = eiu.nle_uv_ouverte_id) as periode, (select diplome_$$c from uv_ouvertes where nle_uv_ouverte_id = eiu.nle_uv_ouverte_id) as diplome, (select uv_$$c from uv_ouv uo,uv_ouvertes uos where uos.uv_ouv_id = uo.uv_ouv_id and uos.nle_uv_ouverte_id = eiu.nle_uv_ouverte_id) as uv, (select categ_abr from ref_categorie where categ_id = eiu.categ_id_insuv) as categ_abr, (select categ_ordre from ref_categorie where categ_id = eiu.categ_id_insuv) as categ_ordre, decode( eiu.publie_$$f, 'O',resuv_$$c, 'N',decode(resuv_$$c, 'ADM',resuv_$$c,'EQU',resuv_$$c,'DES',resuv_$$c,'')) as resuv,
decode( eiu.publie_$$f, 'O', to_char(fonc_resultat_valeurN(#diplome:VARCHAR#, (select uv_$$c from uv_ouv uo,uv_ouvertes uos where uos.uv_ouv_id = uo.uv_ouv_id and uos.nle_uv_ouverte_id = eiu.nle_uv_ouverte_id), resuv_$$c, nb_credits_ects_insuv,nb_credits_ects_insuv)), 'N',decode(resuv_$$c, 'EQU',nb_credits_ects_insuv,'')) as credit,
(select profil_abr from ref_profil where profil_id = eiu.profil_id and diplome_$$c=#diplome:VARCHAR#) as profil_abr, profil_$$f as profilf, nvl(decode(profil_$$f, 'O',(select legende from ref_profil where profil_id = eiu.profil_id and diplome_$$c=#diplome:VARCHAR#), 'N', decode(resuv_$$c,'F','0032','FX','0032', (select legende from ref_profil where profil_id = eiu.profil_id and diplome_$$c=#diplome:VARCHAR#)), ''),'0032') as legende from etu_inscr_uv eiu where etu_id= #etu_id:NUMERIC# and trim(substr(eiu.inscr_adm_id,7,5)) = #diplome:VARCHAR# order by eiu.inscr_adm_id, categ_ordre,uv

SELECT eia.inscr_adm_id as id, eia.etu_id, eia.diplome_$$c, eia.an_univ, eia.prd_univ, eia.periode_libelle as libelle, eia.dipl_spec_abr ||' ' || eia.niveau_adm || ' ' || eia.dipl_opt_abr as formation, case when jury_nouv_$$f='O' then gest_uv.fonc_obs_stg(eia.etu_id,eia.an_univ||eia.prd_univ,1) end as stage,
case when jury_publi_$$f='O' then case when jury_nouv_$$f='O' then eia.obs_gen else replace(substr(eia.obs_pedag,1, decode(instr(eia.obs_pedag,'-',1,3)-1,-1,length(eia.obs_pedag), instr(eia.obs_pedag,'-',1,3)-1)),'- -','-') end else '' end as observation, (select to_char(sout_date,'DD/MM/YYYY') from gerry.these where doct_id = eia.etu_id and substr(eia.an_univ||eia.prd_univ,1,4)=to_char(sout_date,'YYYY')) as soutenance, eia.dipl_spec_$$c, eia.dipl_opt_$$c, (select libelle from gerry.ref_decision where res_pedag_$$c = eia.res_pedag_$$c and diplome_$$c = eia.diplome_$$c) as decision, (select situation from gerry.ref_situation where situation_$$c = eia.situation_$$c) as situation, (select prd_session from gerry.ref_periode where an_univ||prd_univ = eia.an_univ||eia.prd_univ) as prd_session, (select diplome_num from gest_uv.etu_diplome where an_univ||prd_univ = eia.an_univ||eia.prd_univ and etu_id = eia.etu_id and diplome_$$c = eia.diplome_$$c) as diplome_num FROM gerry.vue_etu_inscr_adm eia WHERE eia.etu_id=#etu_id:NUMERIC# and eia.diplome_$$c=#diplome:VARCHAR# and eia.an_univ||eia.prd_univ between #prd_debut:VARCHAR# and #prd_fin:VARCHAR# order by eia.inscr_adm_id

select vtp.etu_id, vtp.diplome_$$c as id, decode(vtp.diplome_$$c,'ING',d.diplome || ' ancien r√®glement',d.diplome) as libelle, vtp.prd_debut, vtp.prd_fin, gerry.fonc_trad_prd_lib(vtp.prd_debut,'anprd') as debut, gerry.fonc_trad_prd_lib(vtp.prd_fin,'anprd') as fin, vtp.reorient_$$f as reoriente, vtp.niv_entree, decode(vtp.dipl_spec_$$c,'110',vtp.dipl_spec_$$c,'128',vtp.dipl_spec_$$c,null) as dipl_spec_$$c, d.PROFIL_C_$$F as profil_c from PROFIL_PARCOURS vtp, gerry.diplome d where vtp.diplome_$$c = d.diplome_$$c and vtp.etu_id = #etu_id:numeric#
vtp.reorient_$$f='N'
order by prd_debut,prd_fin

select rc.categ_id as id, rc.categ_lib as libelle, rc.categ_abr as lib_abr, categ_ordre as ordre from ref_categorie rc, gerry.diplome d where rc.diplome_$$c = d.diplome_$$c and rc.diplome_$$c=#diplome:VARCHAR# and CATEG_ABR<>'NA' and (select pp.an_univ||pp.prd_univ as prd from gerry.param_prd pp,gerry.diplome p where p.diplome_$$c = d.diplome_$$c and par_prd_type=decode(d.prd_type_$$c,'S', 'DEF','U', 'DEF3C') ) between nvl(rc.deb_an_univ||rc.deb_prd_univ,'19001A') and nvl(rc.fin_an_univ||rc.fin_prd_univ,'99992P') order by ordre
select mineur_$$c as mineur from gest_uv.etu_mineur where min_res_$$c in ('ADM','MEN') and etu_id = #etu_id:numeric#

SELECT distinct i.indiv_id as id, rc.civ_fr_abr || ' ' || i.prenom || ' ' || i.nom as civ_nom, i.nom, i.prenom, to_char(i.nais_date,'DD/MM/YYYY') as date_nais, i.nais_com || decode(rp.pays,null, '', ' (' || rp.pays || ')') as com_nais, ie.IND_EMAIL as email, (select BAC_SERIE_ABR from gerry.ref_bac_serie rbs where rbs.BAC_SERIE_$$C = e.BAC_SERIE_$$C ) as bac, e.bac_an as an_bac, (select dipl_obt from gerry.ref_dipl_obt where dipl_obt_$$c = e.dipl_obt_$$c) as der_diplome, e.DIPL_OBT_ETAB as etab_der_diplome, co.conseiller_id, ( select re.civ_fr_abr|| ' ' || ind.nom || ' ' || ind.prenom from gerry.individu ind ,gerry.ref_civilite re where ind.civilite_$$c=re.civilite_$$c and ind.indiv_id = co.conseiller_id) as conseiller, (select ef.form_lib from gerry.etu_formation ef where ef.etu_id=e.indiv_id and ef.etu_form_id = (select max(etu_form_id) from gerry.etu_formation where etu_id=ef.etu_id )) as der_inscription, (select ef.form_an_univ from gerry.etu_formation ef where ef.etu_id=e.indiv_id and ef.etu_form_id = (select max(etu_form_id) from gerry.etu_formation where etu_id=ef.etu_id )) as der_periode, (select dipl_spec_abr||' '||niveau_adm||' '||dipl_opt_abr from gerry.vue_etu_inscr_adm vea where etu_id = i.indiv_id and inscr_adm_id = (select max(inscr_adm_id) from gerry.vue_etu_inscr_adm where etu_id =vea.etu_id)) as act_formation
FROM gerry.etudiant e, gerry.INDIVIDU i, gerry.IND_EMAIL ie, gerry.REF_CIVILITE rc, gerry.REF_PAYS rp, (select distinct conseiller_id,etu_id from gerry.etu_inscr_adm ee where ee.etu_id = #etu_id:numeric# and ee.inscr_adm_id = (select max(inscr_adm_id) from gerry.etu_inscr_adm where etu_id=ee.etu_id) ) co WHERE e.indiv_id=i.indiv_id and i.indiv_id=ie.indiv_id and co.etu_id = i.indiv_id AND i.civilite_$$c=rc.civilite_$$c AND i.nais_pays_$$c=rp.pays_$$c(+) AND ie.email_type_$$c='UTT' AND i.indiv_id = #etu_id:numeric#

SELECT distinct i.indiv_id as id, rc.civ_fr_abr || ' ' || i.prenom || ' ' || i.nom as civ_nom, i.nom, i.prenom, to_char(i.nais_date,'DD/MM/YYYY') as date_nais, i.nais_com || decode(rp.pays,null, '', ' (' || rp.pays || ')') as com_nais, ie.IND_EMAIL as email, (select BAC_SERIE_ABR from gerry.ref_bac_serie rbs where rbs.BAC_SERIE_$$C = e.BAC_SERIE_$$C ) as bac, e.bac_an as an_bac, (select dipl_obt from gerry.ref_dipl_obt where dipl_obt_$$c = e.dipl_obt_$$c) as der_diplome, e.DIPL_OBT_ETAB as etab_der_diplome, 0 as conseiller_id, ( select re.civ_fr_abr|| ' ' || ind.nom || ' ' || ind.prenom from gerry.individu ind, gerry.ref_civilite re where ind.civilite_$$c=re.civilite_$$c and ind.indiv_id = (select distinct conseiller_id from gerry.etu_inscr_adm ee where ee.etu_id = i.indiv_id and ee.inscr_adm_id = (select max(inscr_adm_id) from gerry.etu_inscr_adm where etu_id=ee.etu_id) ) ) as conseiller,
(select ef.form_lib from gerry.etu_formation ef where ef.etu_id=e.indiv_id and ef.etu_form_id = (select max(etu_form_id) from gerry.etu_formation where etu_id=ef.etu_id )) as der_inscription,
(select ef.form_an_univ from gerry.etu_formation ef where ef.etu_id=e.indiv_id and ef.etu_form_id = (select max(etu_form_id) from gerry.etu_formation where etu_id=ef.etu_id )) as der_periode,
(select dipl_spec_abr||' '||niveau_adm||' '||dipl_opt_abr from gerry.vue_eia_abr vea where etu_id = e.indiv_id and inscr_adm_id = (select max(inscr_adm_id) from gerry.vue_eia_abr where etu_id =vea.etu_id)) as act_formation, eia.niveau_adm, '$reoriente$' as reoriente FROM gerry.etudiant e, gerry.INDIVIDU i, gerry.IND_EMAIL ie, gerry.REF_CIVILITE rc, gerry.REF_PAYS rp, gerry.etu_inscr_adm eia WHERE eia.etu_id = e.indiv_id and e.indiv_id=i.indiv_id and i.indiv_id=ie.indiv_id AND i.civilite_$$c=rc.civilite_$$c AND i.nais_pays_$$c=rp.pays_$$c(+) AND ie.email_type_$$c='UTT'
eia.res_pedag_$$c = 'CV'
eia.etu_id in ( select etu_id from gerry.VUE_EIA_ABR where an_univ||prd_univ=#periode:VARCHAR# having count(inscr_adm_id)>1 group by etu_id )
eia.diplome_$$c = #diplome:VARCHAR#
eia.an_univ||eia.prd_univ =#periode:VARCHAR#
eia.dipl_spec_$$c||eia.niveau_adm = #niveau:VARCHAR#
eia.niveau_adm in ('1','2')
eia.niveau_adm in ('3','4','5')
gerry.fonc_enleve_accents(i.nom) like upper(gerry.fonc_enleve_accents(#nom:VARCHAR#))
e.indiv_id =#numero:NUMERIC#
order by eia.niveau_adm, i.nom, i.prenom
order by i.nom, i.prenom

SELECT distinct i.indiv_id as id, rc.civ_fr_abr || ' ' || i.prenom || ' ' || i.nom as civ_nom, i.nom, i.prenom, to_char(i.nais_date,'DD/MM/YYYY') as date_nais, i.nais_com || decode(rp.pays,null, '', ' (' || rp.pays || ')') as com_nais, ie.IND_EMAIL as email, (select BAC_SERIE_ABR from gerry.ref_bac_serie rbs where rbs.BAC_SERIE_$$C = e.BAC_SERIE_$$C ) as bac, e.bac_an as an_bac, (select dipl_obt from gerry.ref_dipl_obt where dipl_obt_$$c = e.dipl_obt_$$c) as der_diplome, e.DIPL_OBT_ETAB as etab_der_diplome, 0 as conseiller_id, ( select re.civ_fr_abr|| ' ' || ind.nom || ' ' || ind.prenom from gerry.individu ind, gerry.ref_civilite re where ind.civilite_$$c=re.civilite_$$c and ind.indiv_id = (select distinct conseiller_id from gerry.etu_inscr_adm ee where ee.etu_id = i.indiv_id and ee.inscr_adm_id = (select max(inscr_adm_id) from gerry.etu_inscr_adm where etu_id=ee.etu_id) ) ) as conseiller,
(select ef.form_lib from gerry.etu_formation ef where ef.etu_id=e.indiv_id and ef.etu_form_id = (select max(etu_form_id) from gerry.etu_formation where etu_id=ef.etu_id )) as der_inscription,
(select ef.form_an_univ from gerry.etu_formation ef where ef.etu_id=e.indiv_id and ef.etu_form_id = (select max(etu_form_id) from gerry.etu_formation where etu_id=ef.etu_id )) as der_periode,
(select dipl_spec_abr||' '||niveau_adm||' '||dipl_opt_abr from gerry.vue_eia_abr vea where etu_id = e.indiv_id and inscr_adm_id = (select max(inscr_adm_id) from gerry.vue_eia_abr where etu_id =vea.etu_id)) as act_formation, eia.niveau_adm, '$reoriente$' as reoriente FROM gerry.etudiant e, gerry.INDIVIDU i, gerry.IND_EMAIL ie, gerry.REF_CIVILITE rc, gerry.REF_PAYS rp, gerry.etu_inscr_adm eia WHERE eia.etu_id = e.indiv_id and e.indiv_id=i.indiv_id and i.indiv_id=ie.indiv_id AND i.civilite_$$c=rc.civilite_$$c AND i.nais_pays_$$c=rp.pays_$$c(+) AND ie.email_type_$$c='UTT'
eia.res_pedag_$$c = 'CV'
eia.etu_id in ( select etu_id from gerry.VUE_EIA_ABR where an_univ||prd_univ=#periode:VARCHAR# having count(inscr_adm_id)>1 group by etu_id )
eia.diplome_$$c = #diplome:VARCHAR#
eia.an_univ||eia.prd_univ =#periode:VARCHAR#
eia.dipl_spec_$$c = #mention:VARCHAR#
eia.niveau_adm in ('1','2')
eia.niveau_adm in ('3','4','5','6')
gerry.fonc_enleve_accents(i.nom) like upper(gerry.fonc_enleve_accents(#nom:VARCHAR#))
e.indiv_id =#numero:NUMERIC#
eia.res_pedag_$$c = 'CV'
order by i.nom, i.prenom
